original_title: メイキング・オブ・クロックタワー3 ～深作欣二がゲームを変えた～
overview: A behind the scenes look at the making of 'Clock Tower 3, focusing on legendary film director Kinji Fukasaku (Battle Royale) and his first foray into the world of video games. Given as a pre-order bonus for 'Clock Tower 3' on PlayStation 2, exclusively in Japan.
title: Making of Clock Tower 3 ~How Kinji Fukasaku Changed the Game~
